AODCore.matrix



struct Matrix;
A simple 2x2 matrix capable of 2D translation, rotation and scaling

this(float _a, float _b, float _c, float _d, float _tx, float _ty);
Constructs a new matrix based off the parameters (if you do not know what params to supply use 
Matrix.New()
instead)

Params:
float _a (0, 0)
float _b (0, 1)
float _c (1, 0)
float _d (1, 1)
float _tx translation x
float _ty translation y

static Matrix New();
Constructs a new matrix with default parameters. That is, the matrix starts off as an identity matrix. This is probably what you want to use.

Returns:
An identity matrix at translation (0, 0)

void Identity();
Sets the matrix to be an identity, that is, the main diagonal is 1 and every other element is set to 0 (including the position)

void Translate(inout(Vector) vec);
Translates the matrix relative to the current position

Params:
inout(Vector) vec Vector to translate relative to the current position

void Translate(float x, float y);
Translates the matrix relative to the current position

Params:
float x Value to translate on the x-axis relative to the current position
float y Value to translate on the y-axis relative to the current position

void Set_Translation(inout(Vector) vec);
Translates the matrix relative to the origin (0, 0)

Params:
inout(Vector) vec Vector to translate relative to origin

void Set_Translation(float x, float y);
Translates the matrix relative to the origin (0, 0)

Params:
float x Value to translate on the x-axis relative to origin
float y Value to translate on the y-axis relative to origin

void Compose(inout(Vector) pos, float rot, Vector scale);
Composes the matrix with a new translation, rotation and scale

Params:
inout(Vector) pos vector to set translation of matrix
float rot Angle to rotate matrix (in radians)
Vector scale vector to set scale of matrix; (1, 1) is default

void Rotate(float rot);
Rotates the matrix

Params:
float rot Angle to rotate matrix (in radians)

void Scale(Vector sc);
Scales the matrix

Params:
Vector sc vector to set scale of matrix; (1, 1) is default
